trans-unit.source: Provides command related utility methods that register <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> objects for class owners and commands, add and remove command event handlers, and provides services for querying the status of a command.
trans-unit.target: 提供與命令相關的公用程式方法，這些方法會註冊類別擁有人和命令的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> 物件、新增與移除命令事件處理常式，並提供查詢命令狀態的服務。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> is responsible for managing routed commands.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>負責管理路由的命令。

trans-unit.source: For more information about commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需命令的詳細資訊，請參閱[指揮概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassCommandBinding%2A> to register a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> to a class as opposed to an instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassCommandBinding%2A>註冊<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>而不是執行個體的類別。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> to register an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> to a class as opposed to an instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A>註冊<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>而不是執行個體的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> method forces the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A>方法強制<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event informs a command source to query the command it is associated with to determine whether or not the command can execute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>事件通知的命令來源查詢來判斷命令是否能執行相關聯的命令。

trans-unit.source: The element to attach <c>handler</c> to.
trans-unit.target: 要附加 <c>handler</c> 的目標元素。

trans-unit.source: The can execute handler.
trans-unit.target: 為可以執行處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Attaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> 附加至指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and attaches them to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> which is a command source for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>，並將它們附加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>即的命令來源<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A>命令。

trans-unit.source: First, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is created and associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: 首先，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>建立並與相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A>命令。

trans-unit.source: Next, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> are created.
trans-unit.target: 下一步<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>所建立。

trans-unit.source: And finally, the handlers are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 而最後，處理常式會附加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 或 <paramref name="handler" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The element to attach <c>handler</c> to.
trans-unit.target: 要附加 <c>handler</c> 的目標元素。

trans-unit.source: The executed handler.
trans-unit.target: 已執行的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Attaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> 附加至指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and attaches them to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> which is a command source for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and attaches them to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> which is a command source for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 或 <paramref name="handler" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> to raise the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 強制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> only pays attention to certain conditions in determining when the command target has changed, such as change in keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>只付款注意中判斷命令目標有變更時，例如鍵盤焦點變更的特定條件。

trans-unit.source: In situations where the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> does not sufficiently determine a change in conditions that cause a command to not be able to execute, <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> can be called to force the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: 中的情況下其中<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>充分判斷條件會導致命令無法執行，請變更<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A>可以呼叫來強制<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> to periodically call <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> to force the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer>來定期呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A>強制<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: The class with which to register <c>commandBinding</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用來註冊 <c>commandBinding</c> 的類別。

trans-unit.source: The command binding to register.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊的命令繫結。

trans-unit.source: Registers a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的型別註冊 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: This method enables a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> to be associated with a class instead than an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>要產生關聯的類別而非類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> or <paramref name="commandBinding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 或 <paramref name="commandBinding" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type to register <c>inputBinding</c> with.
trans-unit.target: 用來註冊的 <c>inputBinding</c> 的類型。

trans-unit.source: The input binding to register.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊的輸入繫結。

trans-unit.source: Registers the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的型別註冊指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: This method enables an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> to be associated with a type instead of an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>與型別，而不是類別的執行個體相關聯。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> or <paramref name="inputBinding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 或 <paramref name="inputBinding" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The element to remove <c>handler</c> from.
trans-unit.target: 要從中移除 <c>handler</c> 的元素。

trans-unit.source: The can execute handler.
trans-unit.target: 為可以執行處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Detaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> 從指定的項目中斷連結。

trans-unit.source: The following example detaches a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> which had previously been attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會卸離<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>的先前已附加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 或 <paramref name="handler" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The element to remove <c>handler</c> from.
trans-unit.target: 要從中移除 <c>handler</c> 的元素。

trans-unit.source: The executed handler.
trans-unit.target: 已執行的處理常式。

trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> 從指定的項目中斷連結。

trans-unit.target: 要從中移除 <c>handler</c> 的元素。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會卸離<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>的先前已附加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 或 <paramref name="handler" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 要從中移除 <c>handler</c> 的元素。

trans-unit.target: 已執行的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Detaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> 從指定的項目中斷連結。

trans-unit.source: The following example detaches a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> which had previously been attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會卸離<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>的先前已附加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 或 <paramref name="handler" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> detects conditions that might change the ability of a command to execute.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> 偵測到會變更執行命令能力的條件。

trans-unit.source: This event holds onto the handler as a weak reference.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會以弱式參考形式保存到處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Objects that listen for this event should keep a strong reference to their event handler to avoid it being garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 接聽這個事件的物件應該保留其事件處理常式，以避免進行記憶體回收的強式參考。

trans-unit.source: This can be accomplished by having a private field and assigning the handler as the value before or after attaching to this event.
trans-unit.target: 這可以藉由具有私用欄位並指派此處理常式做為值之前或附加至這個事件之後完成。
